game-first-time: Hello, I am excited to play the House game with you today!
We are both going to be playing against each other. First you build a house and I try to guess it, and then I build a house and you have to guess what it looks like.
To build your house you are going to drag wall, house, roof and plant pieces into slots. And the I am going to ask questions about your house, and make a guess at the end.
When I build a house, I am going to show you several possible houses, one of which is my house. Then you can ask me questions about what the house looks like.
Okay, lets play! I am sure we  are going to have a lot of fun
game-start: Hello [child-name]! I had a lot of fun playing the house game with you last time. Lets remember house to play. We each build a house and then try to guess what the others persons house looks like
Hey there! I have this great idea for a house I want to build. Lets see if you can ask questions to find out what it looks like. But first you will build a house and I am going to try to guess it.
child-builder-start: Okay, so you are going to start building. Click on a slot, and you can drag pieces into it. Try to make a very cool looking house.
child-answering-questions-start: Now I need to ask you some questions to guess what house you have. So try to answer every question according to your house.
ask-question-piece: Hmmmmm, lets see. Does your house have {piece_name}?
ask-question-color: Anywhere on your house, do you have a {color} piece?
child-builder-compare-houses: Lets take a look at the house that you built side by side and the one I think you built, and see if they are the same house.
child-builder-correct-house: Awesome. I was able to guess your house. Thanks for providing me the correct answers to the questions I asked
child-builder-wrong-piece: Oh no! Looks like our {piece_type} are different. Are you sure you answered my question about the {piece_type} correctly?
child-builder-inverted-pieces: Looks like I have guessed the correct pieces for the {piece_type} . But they are in the wrong places. We need to be a bit more carefull next time about which one is left and which one is right
restart: Do you want to play another round? Just click the New game button
child-guesser-start: I have built a house, and its on the screen with other random houses. Ask me some questions so you can figure out which one it is.
child-guess-piece-yes: Yes! I do have a {piece_name} on my house. Hope that helps!
child-guess-piece-no: Let me take a look. No, unfortunatly I dont have a {piece_name} on my house
robot-builder-compare-houses: Lets compare the houses. I wonder if the house I built is the same that you guessesd.
robot-builder-correct-house: Yay. You were able to ask the right questions and guess exactly the house I was thinking of. Good job!
robot-builder-wrong-piece: Oh no! Looks like our {piece_types} are different. Are you sure you answered my question about the {piece_type} correctly?
robot-builder-inverted-pieces: You might have inverted the pieces for {piece_type}. But it was pretty close
